text: Ranjan (born as Ramanarayana Venkataramana Sarma; 2 March 1918 â€“ 12 September 1983) was an Indian actor, singer, journalist and writer. He first acted in the 1941 movie Ashok Kumar, but became famous in S. S. Vasan's 1948 very well known movie Chandralekha. == Some movies == * (1941) Ashok Kumar * (1943) Mangamma Sapatham * (1945) Saalivaahanan * (1948) Chandralekha * (1949) Nishan / Hindi version of Apporva Sagodharargal * (1950) Mangala * (1952) Shin Shinaki Boobla Boo * (1954) Minnal Veeran * (1957) Neelamalai Thirudan * (1958) Hum Bhi Kuchh Kam Nahin * (1959) Madari * (1960) Air Mail * (1961) Sapera * (1961) Jadoo Nagri * (1961) Khiladi * (1962) " SAKHI ROBIN" * (1965) Accident * (1969) Captain Ranjan (Tamil - Produced in 1960 but released in 1969) ==References== Category:Articles with hCards Category:1918 births Category:1983 deaths
title: Ranjan
